Package Geom

Class GeomRectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Geom.GeomRectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Geom_element
    public class GeomRectangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Geom_element
    This class represents a 2D rectangle in real-life dimensions. It will use 4 points just for ease of use for the programmer, although we can represent a rectangle with 2 points (or 1 point with width and height, etc..)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GeomRectangle​(Point3D leftDown, Point3D rightUp)
      This constructor will create a rectangle object using only 2 points (the upperRight and bottomLeft points)
